name: Velda Defense
description: Velda Defense is a free-to-play mobile game. Conquer each individual level as your castle is tested against onslaughts of dangerous enemies tirelessly marching towards you. Defeat levels to gain experience to make your castle stronger as well as obtain gold to expand your army of Guardians. Strategically place your Guardians around the level to fend off enemies. Receive one-time rewards such as Diamonds and Gold for defeating a level with 1, 2, or 3 stars. Compete with your friends for your spot on the leaderboard. Every day the top 10 players on the leaderboard receive Diamonds based on their rank.
